meanings.definition: Notes at the end of a book or document.
meanings.sent1: The endnotes in the book contained additional information about the author.
meanings.sent2: I always check the endnotes to find out more about the sources used in the research paper.
meanings.sent3: The endnotes at the back of the novel revealed surprising facts about the characters.
meanings.sent4: Her endnotes were like hidden treasures waiting to be discovered at the end of the story.
meanings.sent5: The endnotes acted as a secret guide, leading readers to explore further details.

meanings.definition: To provide endnotes in a written work.
meanings.sent1: The author decided to endnote the research paper for clarity.
meanings.sent2: Remember to endnote your thesis to acknowledge all your sources properly.
meanings.sent3: She endnotes meticulously to ensure all references are accurately cited.
meanings.sent4: Endnoting his work felt like adding the final puzzle piece to the project.
meanings.sent5: The writer's decision to endnote the article made the information more credible.
